label: MergeSkill
description: A skill for merging two or more strings into a single unified string, with an optional user-defined delimiter separating each component part.

fields.label: Insert Post Tag
fields.tooltip: The tag indicates the end of the merged text. By default, the tag is an empty space.

fields.label: Insert Pre Tag
fields.tooltip: The tag indicates the start of the merged text. By default, the tag is an empty space.
